extendedInfo.description: Ozzy's Odyssey is a physics platformer that takes you through an amazing world filled with mind-bending puzzles, fast paced action and beautifully rendered scenes where your little robot will distort the laws of physics themselves!

reviews.comment: Best game I\'ve ever played on my phone. Only problem is it won\'t open anymore :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love this game. It\'s cute and makes you think. Don\'t hesitate on buying! Good job Carbon Crystal Games!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Moderately fun, basic puzzles. Would give it a higher rating, but got constant crashes and it erased my progress over halfway through.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: It is a whimsical platform game with 19 levels. Most levels can be completed in 5 to 10 minutes. A few of them are a bit harder, requiring some thinking and a lot of trial-and-errors. It is a game both adults and kids can enjoy. Indeed, it is rather short and does not have too much replay value. Still, I consider it money well spent. Enjoy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game, kudos to the Dev Team
reviews.comment: Love the challenges, great levels and a fun game to play! My credits to the developers. Hope you guys make some more great games. Keep up the awesome work! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Favorite game!
reviews.comment: I\'m not a game person, (Maybe angry birds for a little while) But I LOVE this one! Worth every penny! Addictive! PLEASE add more levels!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What, exactly, are those spear-wielding goombahs saying?!
reviews.comment: Must be my imagination... Higher levels become fiendishly difficult, but in a good way. An update w. a few more levels would earn this game 5 *s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please more levels!!
reviews.comment: Awesome game. Fun, addicting. Just challenging enough to keep it fun. I want more!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game. Not nearly enough levels for a paid game. Will be 5 stars when more levels. PLEASE!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A great game, but seriously needs more levels or something to extend the games life beyond a couple of days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game, but too short and too easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great..
reviews.comment: Great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Terrific but stuck on the boulder dash level. Please somebody how to I get the micro chip? Keep dying. Help!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rachel
reviews.comment: Awesome game! Needs more levels though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thought was really good. Just a shame I\'ve completed all the levels and there are not any more.\nEleanor.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boulder dash
reviews.comment: I am loving this game, however I am now totally stuck on boulder dash. How do you get the microchip? The little cave guy kills me every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solid game
reviews.comment: I like it. Pretty addictive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitches
reviews.comment: With the newest update it freezes at the beginning of \"A Leap of Faith\" and I really want to keep going:-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really hard!
reviews.comment: Love this game but my lack of patience has forced me to stop playing. Level \"What the?\" Is just too hard! :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little game
reviews.comment: ! Doesn\'t take up any space and gameplay is fun and enjoyable. More levels please haha
